title: Biden to Restore Protections for Three National Monuments
sub_head: White House reverses actions taken by Trump on two monuments in Utah and one off New England coast
body:
WASHINGTONâ€”President Biden will restore protections for two national monuments in Utah and an undersea monument off New England, reversing actions taken by former President Donald Trump.
The move will restore Bears Ears and Grand Staircase Escalante monuments in Southeast Utah to more than 3 million acres put under federal protection by former presidents Bill Clinton and Barack Obama in the southeast corner of Utah, according to the White House.
